import React from 'react'; import { Header, List, Container, Grid, Form, Button, Dropdown, Message } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { tickers } from '../constants/tickerDropdown'; import { formatter } from '../constants/formatCurrency'; class PurchaseStocks extends React.Component { render(){ return ( {/* list of stocks go here */}
Cash - {formatter.format(this.props.user.cash)}

 ) } } export default PurchaseStocks
